titles.title: A resolution to refer H.R. 816 to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-875.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/2/1987--Introduced. Refers H.R. 816, a bill for the relief of certain individuals, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.
